DOC.brief_summary: The particpant complete baseline test measure subject ' quadriceps muscle thickness ( cm ) via ultrasound technology , well complete one repetition maximum ( 1RM ) test leg press machine isometric knee extension use dynamometer - strength measure calculate right left leg . After baseline testing , subject complete 6 week test protocol consist leg press exercise 30 % 1RM . Subjects randomize either wear cuff partially restrict blood flow limb ( Study Group ) , wear cuff restrict blood flow ( Control Group ) . Exercises complete 2x/week take approximately 10 total minute ( 5 warm , 5 test protocol ) per session . After 6 week , muscle thickness , leg press 1RM , quadriceps extension strength re-tested compare initial measurement .
DOC.brief_title: Low Intensity Blood Flow Restriction Training Study
DOC.detailed_description: Session 1 - baseline test - 5-minute warm-up ; 1RM calculation right leave legs use supine leg press machine ; isometric quadriceps strength measurement use dynamometer ; muscle thickness measurement right leave quadriceps muscle use ultrasound technology . - After day 1 testing ; randomly allocate subject either control group experimental group Sessions 2-13 - 6 week exercise protocol , 2x/per week Both experimental control group complete protocol entirety study : - 5- minute warm - Using single-leg press exercise machine : Subjects complete test protocol either partial blood flow restriction ( cuff inflate 100-250 mmhg depend size person ) blood flow restriction ( placebo inflation ) right limb . - Protocol : 30 repetition - 15 repetition - 15 repetition - 15 repetition set separate ~30-90 second . - Right left legs alternate , one leg occlusion cuff Session 14 - Re-test - Re-check 1RM , isometric quad strength , well muscle thickness quadriceps ultrasound
DOC.criteria: Age 1849 Pregnant Hypertensive Recent back low extremity injury History blood clot Varicose vein Adults lack capacity consent
